forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow this morning. The rain and snow will change to all rain by the afternoon hours. High 4C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow this morning changing to all rain for the afternoon. High 41F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 2C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 37F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning transitioning to light rain late. High near 5C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 44F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 47F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.
